dataDeletion.title: Data Deletion Instructions
dataDeletion.instructions:
If you want to delete your account and associated login data for [YOUR APP NAME], follow the steps below:
1. Send an email to: ejason5231@gmail.com 2. Use the subject line: "Delete My Account" 3. Provide the email or Facebook account used to sign in.
We will permanently delete your Firebase Authentication account and related login data within 7 days.
